solution_line_template: Before Samuel walked across the porch, there were {after_walk_particles} - {shoe_particles} = <<{after_walk_particles}-{shoe_particles}={before_walk_particles}>>{before_walk_particles} dust particles.

Those {before_walk_particles} were 1/{remaining_fraction_denominator} of the original amount, so there were {before_walk_particles} * {remaining_fraction_denominator} = <<{before_walk_particles}*{remaining_fraction_denominator}={original_particles}>>{original_particles} dust particles on the porch before Samuel swept.
